In Kanipakam the great lord Ganapathy Temple is situated. The place is very important for all Hindus. The town has become more popular since the Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanam(TTD) board has taken over the place. Most of the pilgrims visiting

value: File:Road to Kanipakam Putalapattu Chittor District.JPG
Road to Kanipakam in Chittor District, Andhra Pradesh

the place is around 2 hours journey by bus. There are APSRTC buses every few minutes shuttling between Tirupathi and Kanipakam.

The Ganapathy Temple is open in the regular hours. But it is best to visit in the morning hours from morning 6AM to 11AM. There is usually a very big crowd. So be ready to stand in line for an hour or so. Wednesdays are a bit more crowded.
